cause.description:
Steadfast. Strong. Brick is firm in his core values, and core. He has a heart of Gold-coated Calcium Silicate, and an advocate for the average Brick in the wall. Join our cause to get brick elected in 2012!
C'mon, let's face it, he's a helluva lot better than any prsident or candidate before him.
1. Brick must become President of the US.
2. We need to raise $100,000,000.00
3. Vote for Brick!
cause.mission: Raise money to support Brick's run for the White House.
cause.name: Campaign to elect Brick President
